website_summaries.verdict: A good choice for riders who want a well-made bike but don't need or feel comfortable with speedier models. Otherwise we recommend others on our shortlist.
pros: Ideal for ladies who like to carry gear on their rides, as it comes with a handy rack
easy to ride on trails and city streets
cons: Only offers 7 speeds, but this won't concern everyone
Seat is uncomfortable, and shock absorption could be better

customer_reviews.title: Loved it until the brakes failed midride
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love this bike. I STILL want to love this bike—it’s comfortable after you break in the saddle, easy to ride, and looks very chic. But when your front brakes totally and completely fail mid ride a month after buying, after dealing with other minor back brake issues for the first few weeks of ownership, it’s a bit hard to love anything about it. I now have a $400 bike too dangerous to ride until I can get the brakes totally replaced. Super.
customer_reviews.author: N. S. Beach

customer_reviews.title: Terrible design
customer_reviews.text: Terrible designed bike. The front wheel has no space between the frame and the tire. All photos are extremely deceiving. If you notice, all photos show the front wheel turned out so you don’t notice the spacing. The pedals also touch the front tire making it impossible to ride. I would strongly urge people to consider other bikes.
customer_reviews.author: Devon Galland

customer_reviews.title: Could be good for some, but didnt meet our expectations
customer_reviews.text: We returned this bike. Disappointed in the quality. Had several defects out of the box. Company offered to pay for service at a bike shop, but didnt really see the point of having to haul a brand new bike across town, whose benefit was delivery direct to our house. Return was easy, no questions asked.
customer_reviews.author: aldridgec

customer_reviews.title: Great bike for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I really love my bike. I was looking at MUCH more expensive options but hadn't ridden a bike regularly in a few years, so I was scared to take the leap and get something pricier. Anyway, I bought this as a "starter" and I love it. It is SO light and easy to handle. I have ridden it on both packed gravel and street and it does well on both. Not ideal for that much gravel, or if it gets loose, but it does fine. I'm very happy and would highly recommend it, especially if you're only riding on the street OR want a bike that's easy to transport or carry up/down stairs.
customer_reviews.author: KP

customer_reviews.title: STURDY & CUTE BUT ASSEMBLY NOT FUN
customer_reviews.text: Overall, I love my new bike! Great color and design aesthetic. It's light weight, easy to ride up hills and feels like it will last. My husband and I struggled to put it together though! The instructions included were missing a key step regarding how to attach the front wheel. It appears the instructions were a general, blanket instruction sheet not specific to the bike! We found the same exact instruction card was included with my husband's bike which was a completely different model. We were able to solve the problem after watching an assembly video on their website. I highly recommend searching for this video so you know what to do!
customer_reviews.author: KLRBEAR84

customer_reviews.title: Total disaster
customer_reviews.text: So getting a bike in the time of Covid isn't normal, but this is STUPID. 1. The bike arrived with INSTRUCTIONS for assembly -- and a notice on the outside of the box that said something to the effect that EXPERT assembly is required in order to have the warranty apply. 2. I am 5'2" and this bike was TOO big for me. Even though I measured accurately. So, I'm selling it -- after paying to have it assembled.
customer_reviews.author: Dixie Reader

customer_reviews.title: As good or better than $$$$ bikes!!
customer_reviews.text: Of course you have to be in the market for this type of ride.... this is not a racing bike. This is truly a comfortable bike for leisure and sight seeing on paved / community trails! Absolutely no pressure on shoulders or back strain! Gears switch easily and it pedals smoothly. The only thing we did to alter the bike is change out the seat, for long range rides I like a softer seat. Otherwise I really love this bike!!!
customer_reviews.author: Connie Carol

customer_reviews.title: Great Bike!
customer_reviews.text: I love my new bike! I had it assembled at a local bike shop. The owner even inquired about this bike to carry in his shop for sale. The teal color is beautiful and comes with touch up paint in case of any dings. The ride is smooth and comfortable! I ride everyday with my Border Collie. I’m sure she likes it too, but she doesn’t talk much.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah C.

customer_reviews.title: Not for Tall people
customer_reviews.text: So far the bike is great, but the height compatibility is definitely off. I am 6' and it says it should fit up to 6'2. I do have long legs (34" inseam) but the bike seat does not go up high enough. Also the seat is not comfortable at all. I will have to buy a longer bike steam and more comfortable seat. womp womp.
customer_reviews.author: Ravens club

customer_reviews.title: Great bike! :)
customer_reviews.text: Loved the bike and color! It’s super light and that’s awesome for a small person like myself. Sadly when putting it together I realized a few pieces were damaged so I had to take it to a bike shop to get them fixed and placed. It’s probably better to just have an specialized place put it together for you if you have thw chance and you’re not a bike expert. Great look and feels just right. Back metal part of the bike doesn’t seem to hold a lot of weight, but no need for that if you’re not planning on carrying more than 5lbs. Fast shipping. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine_Mon

customer_reviews.title: This bike is light, sturdy, and great for getting around town.
customer_reviews.text: This bike is sturdy and made really well. As I am not a mechanic I had it assembled because I wanted it done right. The creme color looks like a banana yellow. I have enjoyed riding on the bike path near my house and a short commute to work. 7-speeds are just the right amount of gears to get me around town. Love this bike!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Fleming

customer_reviews.title: the color on the navy is completely off; not blue
customer_reviews.text: the bike is amazing in most ways so far. but for anyone who is actually invested in what color the bike is, just fyi the "navy" color is nothing like what is pictured here. it's a black color that has some very very _very_ subtle glints of midnight blue when the noon sun is directly hitting it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fine bike but support lacks.
customer_reviews.text: 1) Instruction that came with bike (two of them) were not for this bike. It was similar in ways so I could figure it out but not ideal as i have to pay extra attention on top of putting it together. 2) fender is twisted, and runs against the tire. I tried to make adjustment, but still it is twisted against the frame. 3) little metal piece to hold gender in place was missing in box. After contacting the support, it took a month to receive screws only. Hopefully not another month before receiving correct part...
customer_reviews.author: Sean Suk Lee

customer_reviews.title: Great company
customer_reviews.text: After getting scammed by another bike place, I was stoked to receive this so quickly and it such good condition. It was very easy to set up and I loved that I was able to sign up for a forever warranty or one year warranty once I registered the bike. Excited to take this new bike out!
customer_reviews.author: Kkaranes

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, rides smooth, she’s thrilled with it
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my high school daughter as a bike she will take to college eventually to replace her Trek. High quality details and mechanical components. She’s 5’8” and it fits her well. Plenty of range in the gears allows for longer rides and the speed to keep up with me on my road bike. Added a few accessories that perfectly complimented the aesthetic. Only problem is that now I have to get one for my wife too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Bike
customer_reviews.text: The bike is really beautiful and easy to ride. Relatively easy to put together (I was not able to do it myself but my handy husband could!). The seat is slightly uncomfortable but everything works fine. Only real complaint is that not all of the parts came in the original box. We were missing several and had to email them to get the rest sent- we still haven't received them although they said they would be coming soon. Luckily I can still ride the bike without these parts. Really fun to ride.
customer_reviews.author: Marty Farnsworth

customer_reviews.title: Cute, zippy & a joy to ride
customer_reviews.text: LOVE, LOVE, LOVE my new bike! I was so happy with the purchase, I recommended that my boyfriend get the men's version. It took me a bit longer to put together than planned, so we got the assembly on the second one. Other than that we are thrilled with our new rides
customer_reviews.author: Lisa W.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent purchase
customer_reviews.text: This has to be one of the best purchases I have made! It came two days later, was easy to assemble, and rides beautifully! I have an old Trek Hybrid that doesn’t ride anything like this one. The quality is great, lightweight, gorgeous blue, and perfect for everyday strolls around town or rides with my kids on trails. I couldn’t be more in love!
customer_reviews.author: Tim Corbett

customer_reviews.title: Just a couple simple issues
customer_reviews.text: The assembly instructions didn’t match the bike so for the most part it was simple to put together but the front tire was a pain because I was just going off the instructions which didn’t mention anything about adding a whole other piece. The rack in the back ( the bolts) completely stripped on one side so we had to get different bolts, which wasn’t a big deal just inconvenient. Over all happy with this bike.
customer_reviews.author: colleen allison

customer_reviews.title: Classic Cruiser Cool
customer_reviews.text: I love my bike!! The cream color is classic and very cool. I bought a basket so I can hit the local farmer's market and bring home my purchases and there is a rack on the back. A couple of bungee cords and I am good to go. I put the bike together myself, but ended up needing help adjusting the brakes from the local bike shop. This is a nice, solid bike. So, so happy!!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Chavez

customer_reviews.title: Quality control to the wind.
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice bike for the most part, but the front wheel bearings were grinding, and after taking them apart, I discoved some of the ball bearings were partially sheared. This was all before even riding the bike.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathon

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful bike!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful bike! Received in the mail within two days and I must say I love it! I previously used a shared bike system as I used it to ride to work every day. After days of going to stations and riding clunky bikes to work I decided to get my own. I absolutely love this bike. It is so beautiful and rides very smooth. The gears shift well and it is so light but still sturdy! I would highly recommend this bike to others looking for everyday bike transportation. It has 7 speeds and rides very comfortably - not to mention the sleek and modern design that it has. Love this bike, great details, sturdy and rides well!
customer_reviews.author: Tricia

customer_reviews.title: Wrong color sent
customer_reviews.text: Decent bike - could prob be priced a little lower given direct to consumer, but I understand the shipping costs. Unfortunately, we ordered the Navy blue with chrome rims, and instead got a black frame with light blue rims. We are currently trying to decide whether to just send the bike back, or possible accept a discount and keep it.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Nice bike, easy to assemble, very light pedal
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this bike and received it very quickly within 4 days. I like this bike, I ride it every day to school and around town to exercise. It has 7-speeds, so it is very easy for me to go uphill or flat road, very light pedal.
customer_reviews.author: B Tran

customer_reviews.title: Bike review
customer_reviews.text: Instructions were impossible to follow. Just search it on YouTube and it’s much easier to figure out...but still takes some work. The bike itself is nice but the handle bar screw does not stay tight even after multiple tightenings. Does the job but has some faults
customer_reviews.author: Adavis

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install. Smooth ride.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and nice smooth ride. Easy to install. I bought this for my wife and she loves this bike. It’s really trendy looking and elegant.
customer_reviews.author: Street-Cred Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this bike based on the overwhelmingly positive reviews. Unfortunately, my experience has been less than that. The product arrived with a broken spoke. Amazon offered to discount the price, but even with the discount the bike is not worth the price I paid. I would return if it wasn't already assembled and box has been discarded. I am having a difficult time understanding how this bike has so many 5 star reviews considering its low-quality vs. the price I paid. Buyer beware!
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: So happy with my new bike
customer_reviews.text: So happy with my new bike! Wasn’t hard to put together and it’s perfect for our family bike rides. Quality and great looking, my favorite color is an added bonus! Highly recommend 👍
customer_reviews.author: Mama Bear Corey

customer_reviews.title: Plan to Spend hours assembling
customer_reviews.text: hard to put together. Took my husband 5 hours. Instructions are vague. Bike seat is extremely uncomfortable. Otherwise bike rides well
customer_reviews.author: sacredfoodchef

customer_reviews.title: Stunning and lightweight bike! Very happy purchase
customer_reviews.text: I have used this bike a few times now and I am always getting compliments. I really enjoy the smooth ride and the fact that the bike is really lightweight. It was a bit tricky to assemble but with some help we got it done. Overall, I think it's great value for the money. I am happy with it and hope to keep using this bike often. The beige color also came out really nice.
customer_reviews.author: LettyV

customer_reviews.title: Love this bike
customer_reviews.text: Love this bike! My dad put it together in about an hour, no problems. I get tons of compliments.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Grove

customer_reviews.title: not an expensive bike.  But subpar quality does not justify the cost.
customer_reviews.text: Some parts are not fitted well. Assembling instructions could be better
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful bike
customer_reviews.text: My sister love exercise. I ordered the bike as a gift for my sister, she likes it. She plans to ride the bike daily. It is very smooth and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Quy Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Great bike for getting around town!
customer_reviews.text: Love this bike! Perfect for jaunts around town. Love that it has the storage rack on the back. Well made and easy to put together. Would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Disgruntled

customer_reviews.title: The bike is great. I bought it for my daughter and she ...
customer_reviews.text: The bike is great. I bought it for my daughter and she loves the way it looks and rides
customer_reviews.author: Judy S.

customer_reviews.title: I like the style of the bike and it seems to ...
customer_reviews.text: I like the style of the bike and it seems to be a good quality. However, I am very disappointed in the color. I ordered navy but is more royal blue. Not at all what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: erin wiley

customer_reviews.title: Great value.
customer_reviews.text: We have two of these for our daughters. They have held up well and are very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: All is great after a little help
customer_reviews.text: Assembly wasn't bad but there was a problem with one brake. I had to take it apart to fix the wire properly. I rode it for awhile but the brakes didn't seem right. After a tuneup at REI and a long ride, I love it and all is working well.
customer_reviews.author: Sue Bunnie

customer_reviews.title: Use a bike mechanic
customer_reviews.text: I did not buy this bike but have been biking for 65 years and if I read another review on how hard a bike is to put together my head will explode. When you get your bike you take it to a bike shop and have them put it together for you. The charge for doing this and getting a proper tune up should be around 50 to 75 dollars and money well spent. After you ride your bike for a couple of months it is worth having a secondary tune up. Having you bike done by a professional bike mechanic is worth its weight in gold and Safety.
customer_reviews.author: Dudley Eppes

customer_reviews.title: My perfect bike!
customer_reviews.text: It has been years since I rode a bike and I wanted to incorporate some outdoor physical activity back in my life. I knew bike riding was it! I knew I wanted a cruiser bike and after researching I found my perfect dream bike at Sixthreezero. I love the fact that based on your lifestyle they were able to customize the right fit for me. My dad built my bike with their awesome video tutorial. I can tell they take great pride in their work and I take pride in being able to ride my beautiful new Sixthreezero bike! It’s comfortable and beautiful! Thank you Sixthreezero!
customer_reviews.author: Cathia Santos

customer_reviews.title: Great bike!
customer_reviews.text: This bike is lightweight, and rides extremely smoothly. The gears change effortlessly, and the whole riding experience has been great. I have not ridden in years, and after I bought this bike, I started riding 4-5 miles a day without feeling any discomfort. My husband assembled the bike, and even though the instructions were for a different bike, and he has never assembled bikes before, he managed to figure it out and assembled it in about 40 minutes. I am 5'1" and the seat of the bike can be adjusted for someone even shorter. I have my seat set a few inches taller than the lowest setting. Sixthreezero was very responsive when I called them with some questions before buying.
customer_reviews.author: Priya

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product
customer_reviews.text: I bought my wife an Explore your range cream 7 Speed Commuter Hybrid Bike back in June. She assured me she is not a cyclist and I wouldn't be able to sway her opinion. How wrong she was, now opts to cycle to work everyday. Not only is it a thing of beauty to look at but also incredibly well designed ergonomically. The upright cycling position eliminates lower back pain and the curled handlebars ensure a comfortable journey. The little touches like the handlebar grips are built to a high quality and she regularly receives compliments on her new bike. The team at Sixthreezero are incredibly helpful and made the whole process seamless. Absolutely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome customer service
customer_reviews.text: My bike is awesome! I had so much fun assembling it, and in the process, I learned so much about bike maintenance. This company really encourages you to be a knowledgeable and confident bike owner, which is worth its weight in gold. I realized after I assembled most of the bike that they’d accidentally sent me the 7 speed instead of the 21 speed, but I decided to keep it anyway. Customer service got back to me within 24 hours with a refund and explanation. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Izzy M

customer_reviews.title: Don't use the provided instructions.
customer_reviews.text: I love my bike, but the assembly process was a nightmare. The instructions you receive with this bike ARE WRONG look up the video or contact customer service to get it. I was close to tears from frustration when the assembly wasn't successfully due to the incorrect instructions provided. Customer service was always courteous, but not always timely. I've had to follow up on two occasions, I allow for a week of response time before I reach out again. As for the bike itself, the saddle is extremely uncomfortable, but a cushioned saddle is a quick remedy. It is beautiful and I enjoy riding it around.
customer_reviews.author: Slashley

customer_reviews.title: Awesome bike
customer_reviews.text: Great bike and company! Sixthreezero customer service is top notch. The back wheel was damaged from shipping but I was sent a replacement within days after contacting customer service. At 5 ft tall, I was worried the bike would be too big. The low stand over height is a good fit for me. The color and minimal branding caught my eye. 7 speed gears make riding trails and inclines easy! The seat is a little hard after long rides but I’m hoping it will soften over time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great bike for all sizes!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this bike. Part of the reason I love it so much is that I am NOT a small girl. Many bikes I feel don’t support me well, but this one does. The color is great. I’ve gotten a lot of compliments on how nice it looks. We loved it so much we got the men’s version for my husband!
customer_reviews.author: Mark A. Sabina

customer_reviews.title: Eye catching joy!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bike to replace a more traditional hybrid, and I have no regrets at all. The upright posture of this bike has been a game changer for me...I have so much more fun riding it than I ever did a more typical head-forward posture bike, which means I ACTUALLY RIDE EVERY SINGLE DAY. The best bike is one you'll actually ride, right? It's not light (I think around 30 pounds) but it's a smooth ride, shifts cleanly, and gets compliments shouted at me literally every time I take it out, haha. I'm having a blast with it, and would recommend it wholeheartedly.
customer_reviews.author: DWW

customer_reviews.title: Pretty little Bike
customer_reviews.text: This is a very pretty bike. I got a tear color because that was the only color that was available when I made the purchase in late April. Took 3 weeks for me to get the bike during quarantine period, but i like the look, the color, and lightness of this bike. One only complaint is that I can't mount the back rack attached to the body. The screw provided was too short and rack was not align properly to secure the rack to the body frame. After many tries, I gave up putting it on. But overall, it is a nice lightweight bike.
customer_reviews.author: Kyaw Win

customer_reviews.title: Extremely comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the Explore Your Range Women's 7 Speed Commuter Hybrid Bike. I’ve never had a hybrid bike before so I didn’t know what to expect. After purchasing, the company emailed me everything I needed, including a digital manual & a support contact info should I need it. Once the bike was delivered, it was super easy to assemble. It took me about an hour. I couldn’t believe how comfortable the ride was! The seat is extremely padded & I like the riding posture. I can easily ride 20 miles on this bike. Not to mention the coral color is so pretty! I get many compliments on it :) All in all, I’m super happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Great bike
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for "European" looking bike and came across this one. Got delivered pretty fast after the order was placed. It took my husband about 45 mins to put it together ( i did not hear any complaints, so i would assume all went smoothly). I The bike itself rides quite nicely.It took me while to get used to how light it is ( compared to my hybrid). It is comfortable to ride ( nice posture, comfortable seat), and if needed, can go pretty fast. I mostly use it to roam around the city and did not try it in rougher conditions. All in all, i am quite satisfied with the purchase and service received.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Rozova

customer_reviews.title: Goldilocks of Bikes
customer_reviews.text: I actually didn’t end up buying this bike through Amazon because I needed it assembled and delivered to a location in LA within 48 hours. I have a few firmstrongs, and a Nirve bike as well. The Firmatrongs are fine, but definitely get thrashed and are on the lower quality end. The Nirve is really nice, three speed, but so heavy and cumbersome, I sort of avoid riding it. The sixthreezero is the perfect inbetween, comfy, stylish and not cumbersome. Also, who else will get you what you need that quickly!! Five stars!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica K

customer_reviews.title: Great Bike for the Money!
customer_reviews.text: Great bicycle for the money. I was leary about the fact that it needed assembly, but found a local bike shop that did it for me. Still a great deal even after the assembly fee. I use this bicycle every day and am amazed at how great it rides. Color options are also a plus. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Fran Brown

customer_reviews.title: My wife loved the bike!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bike for my wife. She loved it from day one. It was easy to assemble and very comfortable to ride around our neighborhood. If you are looking for a quality bike don't look anywhere else. Their customer service is excellent as well, well trained personnel available to help via phone or chat. Well done
customer_reviews.author: Giovanni

customer_reviews.title: Love this bicycle!
customer_reviews.text: I would highly recommend Sixthreezero to anyone looking to purchase a bicycle online. I ordered the bike with some assembly required. I have no experience putting bikes together so I was a little nervous but Sixthreezero provided a clear guidebook, links to YouTube videos and direct contact information for their customer service reps. I was able to put it together in about an hour!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley C.

customer_reviews.title: Great Bike
customer_reviews.text: I've had this bike for about a year and am very impressed with this bike. Great value for the price. Upon arrival, there were a few missing pieces so I contacted customer service and they sent me the new parts. Assembly was a little challenging as I've never assembled a bike before. Rides is smooth and stable. I live in the city so use it a lot to bike for groceries or local errands, making the back rack very handy! You won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: CommandShiftFour

customer_reviews.title: Best looking bikes for a reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful bike at a beautiful price point! I assembled it alone in under 2 hours. It rides nicely and I could stare at it all day. I can’t wait to ride around San Diego in style! Thank you Sixthreezero for your mission & quality products!!
customer_reviews.author: lass1216

customer_reviews.title: Great bike, couple small manufacturing probs
customer_reviews.text: Great bike. Rides smoother than most bikes, even though you can really kick it in gear and go fast! Nice, upright sitting position. Putting it together was relatively easy, although the back rack won't quite attach on one side. Also, one of the plastic pieces on the left handlebar is kind of sharp, so I actually got a cut when I went over a big bump and wasn't paying attention. BUT I still really love this bike and it was worth the money. If you're looking for a solid, good-looking bike you can cruise on, leisurely or quickly, this is your bike.
customer_reviews.author: Kaela Dickens

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Bike!
customer_reviews.text: This bike is beautiful! It is very easy and fun to ride and easy to build. The customer service is also top notch. I was able to comfortably fit an infant seat for my almost one year old. We love the bike!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous and functional!
customer_reviews.text: Really love this bike, it’s pretty, it’s comfortable , easy to put together. Love that it’s a hybrid too, it has the style of a cruiser in some ways but more functional with its speed and straight handlebars. I like it a lot!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this bike
customer_reviews.text: I love this bike! It is the best bike I have ever owned! I work at a computer desk all day and have problems with neck and arm pain. I can ride this bike in comfort because of the handlebar and seat positioning which are both easily adjusted. It is a fast bike and my husband has a hard time keeping up with me on his roadbike! It rides very smooth. My husband had it put together with the printed instructions in less than one hour. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: LORA ELLERBE

customer_reviews.title: Smooth and fast ride!
customer_reviews.text: Love this bike! It’s such a smooth and fast ride! I took it on a 15 mile inaugural ride and couldn’t believe how effortless and smooth the whole ride was! I highly recommend the Explore Your Range bike
customer_reviews.author: Tracy A Wilde

customer_reviews.title: Amazing bike!
customer_reviews.text: I got my bike in June and it is just perfect! The leather, color, everything! It looks so posh! I’m trying to ride it as frequently as I can, because it is just a pleasure. People ask me where I got it all the time!
customer_reviews.author: Ganna Semenova

customer_reviews.title: Excellent All-Around Bike
customer_reviews.text: We have purchased both men’s and Woman’s 7 speed EVRYjourney over the past year and have thoroughly enjoyed riding throughout our neighborhood. The bikes are well designed to help us enjoy our rides without having to bend or reach excessively while providing an energetic work-out. We highly recommend these bicycles for all ages and sizes.
customer_reviews.author: Conda FernandeZ

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: I've owned a sixthreezero bike for years, and pretty much ride it every weekend. I recently purchased this bike for my wife. I easily put it together myself, and had my local bike shop give it a one over just to be sure. The company's customer support was very helpful when I did have a question. My wife LOVES THIS BIKE! Its perfect for our beach cruises, but also longer rides on city streets. Lightweight and easy to throw in the back of my Jeep. I'd buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Jay T

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, looks good, rides well.
customer_reviews.text: Bought the Explore Your Range for my wife four mother's day. Comfortable ride, smooth shifting, and looks great. She's happy, so I'm happy. Would definitely buy another one but I don't think I'll have to anytime soon.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Shelton

customer_reviews.title: Coolest bike on the block
customer_reviews.text: My bike looks so nice and now everyone wants one
customer_reviews.author: Triston

customer_reviews.title: The perfect bike!
customer_reviews.text: I have the Explore Your Range, 7 Speed and absolutely love my bike! Not only is it super cute aesthetics wise (I get compliments allll the time), but it rides smoothly and is the perfect bike for riding around the city or along the beach. If you are looking for a bike, I highly recommend sixthreezero! I also suggest having them assemble it. :)
customer_reviews.author: JW

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Bike and Smooth Ride
customer_reviews.text: I recently got the ExploreYourRange 7 speed in navy and absolutely love it. The bike was easy to put together and rides beautifully. I get a lot of compliments on this bike! It’s also pretty light weight - I live up two flights of stairs and have to carry it up and down which isn’t too difficult. I highly recommend this bike.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: This is such a beautiful and smooth riding bicycle
customer_reviews.text: This is such a beautiful and smooth riding bicycle. I ordered the explore your range as a birthday gift to myself and I love it so much. It really is the nicest bike I've ever owned. I ordered it through the sixthreezero website and have had such awesome customer service! We are definitely wanting to order my husband a bike from sixthreezero as well. Next step is to get a baby seat so my daughter can enjoy cruising around on this beauty as much as I do!
customer_reviews.author: kirsty

customer_reviews.title: Biking for pleasure.
customer_reviews.text: After some intensive research and too many reviews read to remember, I pulled the trigger on this wonderful bike and bought 2. It arrived quickly and was assembled in no time. Easy to ride, nice to look at and comfortable for an old man. Yes, I bought a ladies bike, the "boys" thank me. My wife enjoys her's very much as well. Wasn't looking to compete. Wanted a bike to enjoy some flatter trails and "ching-ching" the day away.
customer_reviews.author: John Hall

customer_reviews.title: This bike is everything you would expect and more! LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: Love this ride! I have been a Schwinn lover all my life until I got this sixthreezero bike. The seat is comfortable, switching gears is smooth and handling is so accurate. The bike arrived quickly, easy to assemble and I am a happy cyclist now. Quick delivery and great price. I am very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Roloff

customer_reviews.title: I recommend this bike!
customer_reviews.text: This bike is great for beach cruising, bike trails, and even the road. Great for the non-serious cyclist who just rides for fun and it's been great for exercise- at least that's the way I use it. I have had zero problems with it, I did buy a different seat for comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany M. Brandreth

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful bicycle!
customer_reviews.text: I love my bike so much! It is a great ride aside from the seat being slightly uncomfortable but with the proper attire it's fine. The assembly instructions were a little challenging but with some videos from their Vimeo I was able to put it together. Overall a very great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki Raynor

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Bike
customer_reviews.text: A great bike for getting around the suburbs and park trails. Shipped quickly, quality customer service, and the bike looks great with a basket attached! Highly recommend, love this bike!
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte

customer_reviews.title: This bike rides very smoothly. Very comfortable seat.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this bike for my wife so we could ride together. We are beginners and this bike fits our needs perfectly. Very good looking bike up close. We get compliments on it all the time. This bike rides very smoothly. Very comfortable seat. Hybrid wheels are good for road paths and dirt paths. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Koester

customer_reviews.title: Great Communication Even Better Bike
customer_reviews.text: Great Communication through the virus. Bike is exactly what was promised. I appreciated the touch up paint. The guys are AWESOME!!!
customer_reviews.author: Eric sandrick

customer_reviews.title: Fast Shipping & Easy Assembly - Ride In The Park
customer_reviews.text: ok. the back fender was dented so i just took off both fenders & i like it better. i also ditched the rear rack. it looked cheap to me. the bike is a dream to ride. maybe a bit overpriced but it is well made and quite beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Suhni California

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this bike as a gift. It took a little bit of time to put together but was fairly simple. No complaints. Rides great.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Easy assembly, comfortable ride
customer_reviews.text: It was really easy to assemble and really fun to ride. I'm happy and would definitely buy from this company again.
customer_reviews.author: Christabel De La Lune

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Bike
customer_reviews.text: I loved the look of the bike, the ease to put it together and thought it's a commuter bike cam essentially take me anywhere. It's really been beneficial to me being my main point of transportation!!.... also all the compliments on it don't hurt😊
customer_reviews.author: Laura Elery

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, comfortable and light!
customer_reviews.text: This bike is beautiful the handle grips are so soft as is the seat. My husband had it put together in no time. The biggest surprise is that it looks like a heavy bike and in actuality it is quite light.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Stone

customer_reviews.title: Very happy customer
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love my sixthreezero bike! It's comfortable and a perfect size. I bought the white basket to go in front to hold my water bottle, cell phone, and jacket. It has easily fit on my bike rack that straps to the back of my car. I'm always getting compliments of how cute my bike is and how smooth it is to ride. I have had no problems with this bike and I would recommend this company to everyone. Well worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... I'm not exactly an expert but so far I love it. It's super cute and a fun way ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the first bike I've had in years so I'm not exactly an expert but so far I love it. It's super cute and a fun way to get around town. I've had it for a few months and haven't had any problems with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute, lightweight, smooth riding, and easy to assemble !
customer_reviews.text: Love the colors, it’s lightweight and assembly was simple !!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this Stylish Bike
customer_reviews.text: Overall really like the bike so far. It has been comfy, convenient, and is even super stylish.
customer_reviews.author: John Mills

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This bike is awesome! Super comfortable and rides so smooth!
customer_reviews.author: Brianna Martin

customer_reviews.title: love my bike
customer_reviews.text: love my bike! get compliments on it all the time. easy to ride. Hubs put it together with minimal frustration (bonus). Love having the option of different gears for around town. definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: rashton

customer_reviews.title: Best bike I ever owned
customer_reviews.text: So very easy to put together. I absolutely love this
customer_reviews.author: Mrskunz

product_meta.title: sixthreezero Hybrid-Bicycles sixthreezero Explore Your Range Women's Commuter Hybrid Bike
product_meta.description:
Made for the rider who wants to ride fast and seek new places, the sixthreezero Explore Your Range women's bicycle features a Shimano 7-speed external derailleur and a hybrid frame that easily handles both city streets and hard-packed trails. Featuring lightweight aluminum construction, the Explore your Range has a classic diamond frame design, plus a seat and handlebar geometry that puts you in an upright, heads-up position. 

Offering maximum versatility for a wide range of activities, the Shimano 7-speed external derailleur enables you to cover longer distances and enjoy higher intensity riding. This stylish bike is outfitted with a comfortable brown synthetic leather saddle and matching grips with classic stitching.

It also comes with front and rear handbrakes for easy stopping, twist shifter for quick gear changes, a 700 x 38C wheel set, double-walled rims for a smooth ride, rear rack for mounting optional baskets or panniers (sold separately), and matching full fenders. It fits riders from 5 feet to 6 feet, 2 inches tall, and it comes 85 percent assembled.

Designed with comfort, ease, and eye-catching style, sixthreezero bikes offer affordable quality for a vast range of riders.
feature_bullets: Hybrid 7-speed Women's commuter bike with lightweight aluminum frame; ideal for riding on hard-packed trails or through the city
Shimano 7-speed external derailleur allows wide range of rides, from leisure to long distance; front and rear handbrakes for easy stopping
Rear rack for optional baskets; seat and handlebar geometry puts rider in an upright, heads-up position
700 x 38C wheels with double-walled rims for a smooth ride; comfortable Brown synthetic leather saddle and matching grips with Classic stitching
Fits riders from 5 feet, to 6 feet 2 inches tall; comes 85 percent assembled
